_sText:
2_hills is out on fpsb!

This map is a v2 of my last map (ka_2_hills).

I fixed alot of thing's in this map and made more things for a good game. It is a bit laggy and the max players are 40. but i say you should use 20 as it could get a bit over the top and crash. :D

I made a vidio. Im just trying to get it on youtube so it dose not look as bad, but this is fast for now and i wanted to show you guys the map.

note: I dont have any map sound's on the vidio. So just if you want to know-
Sound 1: thunder
Sound 2: rain 
(Also some more sounds)
